author: Almabeach
title: Great little set
review: Got this one for a steal price of 8.99 in a discount bin at a pharmacy. I really got my money’s worth with this set. A fun, quick build. A lot of pieces (75) but not a hassle to build as is the case sometimes with these tiny vehicles. A lot of stickers which I like. The minifig looks great and a few bonus points for that sweet scorpion part which I never saw before!
